properties.name: withdraw_banks_url
properties.description: The Paystack Withdraw Banks list available API URL

properties.name: ussd_banks_list
properties.description: The list of banks available for USSD payments

properties.name: paystack_recipient_type
properties.description: Recipient Type (Only nuban at this time)

properties.name: paystack_transfer_source
properties.description: Where should we transfer from? Only balance for now

properties.name: secret_key
properties.description: Paystack API requires a secret key to sign requests. Please paste your secret key here.

properties.name: verify_deposit_url
properties.description: Confirm the status of a transaction API URL

properties.name: ussd_expired_after_minutes
properties.description: Time in minutes that the transaction will be active. 0 Never Expired. Default 0

properties.name: disable_account_for_bins
properties.description: Comma separated list of card bins. New accounts will be created with status DISABLED for the cards with bins the list.

properties.name: bank_account_lookup_bank_account_flag
properties.description: Bank Account Lookup. Set true to append Bank Account field to Bank Account Lookup

properties.name: bank_account_lookup_bank_code_flag
properties.description: Bank Account Lookup. Set true to append Bank Code field to Bank Account Lookup

properties.name: bank_account_lookup_bank_name_flag
properties.description: Bank Account Lookup. Set true to append Bank Name field to Bank Account Lookup
